```{r}
durham_2020 <- read_csv("./data/durham_2020_cleaner_headers.csv")
```

```{r}

first_question <- durham_2020[, c(1:10, 222)] %>% 
  pivot_longer(2:10, names_to="question")

ggplot(first_question, aes(x=question, y=factor(value), color=zip, group=id)) +
  facet_wrap(~zip) + 
  geom_line(alpha = 0.2)

```

```{r}

covid_question <- durham_2020[, c(1, 41, 37:40, 222)] %>% 
  pivot_longer(2:6, names_to="question")

ggplot(covid_question, aes(x=question, y=factor(value), color=zip, group=id)) +
  facet_wrap(~zip) + 
  geom_line(alpha = 0.2)

```
